PATIENT_ID: TEST_BCVI_002
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-04 14:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-04 14:10:00
Category III activation for 55-year-old female with isolated ankle injury
after twisting mechanism on stairs. No head or torso involvement.
BP 126/78, HR 74, RR 14, GCS 15.
Alert and oriented. No complaints of dizziness or visual changes.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-04 14:30:00
Right ankle x-ray: lateral malleolus fracture, nondisplaced.
No other imaging obtained.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-04 14:50:00
Isolated ankle fracture. Splinted. Orthopedic follow-up arranged.
Discharged in stable condition.
